lines: Me Nyankopɔn, sɛ mifi ahodw'ri mu
Dwennwen nsase aWo nsa ayɛ ho,
Mihu ns'romma, mete aprannaa mmobom,
Wo tum a ɛda adi wiase a,
Me kra to dwom maW',
m'Agyenkwa Nyame,
Woyɛ kɛse, Woyɛ kɛse!
Me kra to dwom maW',
m'Agyenkwa Nyame,
Woyɛ kɛse, Woyɛ kɛse!
Sɛ mikyinkyin kɔfa mfofoo ne kwae mu,
Na mete nnmaa nnwom dɛdɛ nnua mu;
Mifi mmepɔ atenten so hwɛ fam na
Mete 'suten nne ne mframa dwoo a:
Medwen sɛ Nyame ankora Ne Ba no,
Maa No bewui a Mintum' nte ase;
Sɛ 'sɛnnua so ɔde 'nigye soaa m' bɔne
Hwiee mogya gui de yii me bɔne hɔ.
Sɛ Kristo de osebɔ dennen sian ba
Bɛfam' kɔ fič a, 'nigye bɛhyɛ me ma.
Afei mede 'hobrɛase bɛtontom No,
Na mateam sɛ: Nyame, Woyɛ kɛse!
